title: Two laws. Part 2: Welfare times
creator_credit: Alessandro Cavadini, Carolyn Strachan and Australian Film Commission
brief_description: Part 2 of a 4-part innovative film entitled “Two laws” which deals with the Borroloola people’s struggle for the recognition of their law. Describes the life of the Borroloola community under the welfare system of the 1950s to the present day. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
